website_summaries.verdict: Though versatile, other models that are less pricey and straightforward to use offer similar results.
pros: Five blades deliver a variety of slice options, including thin shreds
cons: Somewhat confusing to use at first
Requires strength to slice firm vegetables

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is taking some time to get use to and trial and error. It would be nice if they would include a guideline to which vegetables work the best with each different blade. You really need some muscle to crank it and work some of the veges through the blade. So far I have only found that only 2 -3 of the blades work for most of the vegetables that I use, and I use a lot of different ones! The one nice feature is the suction cup on the bottom that holds it fairly secure in place. With all of the positive reviews on this one, I was really hoping for more.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Sharp? Human blood on it!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t believe my eyes when I found human blood on the body of the spiralizer itself, on several blades, and on the suction handle! This is just wrong!!! I am at a loss for words.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Albert

customer_reviews.title: My new goto for spiralizing veggies!
customer_reviews.text: This spiralizer is a sheer joy to use! The large suction cup on the bottom holds amazingly well on a smooth countertop! The positive latch system on the blades feel a lot safer than the old way. The blade holding cup is just another bonus! Brieftons has hit a home run with this improved model!
customer_reviews.author: DilbertTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Order This Item
customer_reviews.text: The Brieftons 5-Blade Spiralizer (BR-5B-02) is not what is, as advertised. I ordered the Heavy Duty version because I do a lot of cooking. I worked up a sweat just spiralizing a carrot, and didn't get much after the carrot worked though the device. I am dissappointed with how all vegetables went through the machine. It is made of flimzy plastic, difficult to turn the handle. I worked way too hard for what I was left with. Plus, with all veggies, you are left with half of it, in a long cylinder shape. No way to chop/slice to match the curly ones. Very dissappointed. Now, I am having difficulty attempting to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: failure point
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this, I absolutely loved it. And it would be wonderful still, if not for one failure point. The suction cup which holds it in place while you use it, is made from a really cheap rubber that wears out in a few months, whether you use it a lot or not. Once that happens, the device is nearly impossible to use. I would gladly pay more for this device, only with a high-quality silicon rubber suction cup which remains pliable and functional. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cascaddan

customer_reviews.title: It works, just not super great.
customer_reviews.text: It makes great noodles. But It wastes a lot of the product while doing so if you’re just using smaller zucchini’s like I do, because it takes a large punch out of the center of them as it’s cutting. So the entire core is left. And the suction cup is very very poorly made so it comes loose and suddenly slips across the counter. I thought the first one was just defective but it was the same with the second one. But when I want noodles, it gets the job done with a little finesse on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: good for soft veggies only.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for softer vegetables, such as zucchini/cucumber, etc.. Does not work very well with potatoes cuz the harder vegetables require more force in order to be able to use the crank.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: This is the best kitchen Gadget of all time
customer_reviews.text: This is the best kitchen Gadget of all time.. I just made sweet potato spirals...makes anyone a cooking super hero 😊
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: The advantages given are all true, BUT
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that you can not spiralize carrots unless they are 1.5 inches in diameter. We have a very cheap spiralizer that spiralizes carrots very well. I don't care for the size of core on this machine, it is close to 1/4 inch. All in all, I prefer our cheap little machine. We bought this one to upgrade our spiralizer experience. Dissappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Scion 4B

customer_reviews.title: Eh... no.
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like this. I wish I would have gotten around to returning it as I only used it once and it kept popping loose. It hurt my hands trying to stabilize and crank it and made a mess in general with cucumbers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spinning with delight
customer_reviews.text: So easy this thing works great. My only reason for not making it a 5 star is that the blades are not labeled. If you match the blade to the pictures you can see a pattern in the spikes; thats how we figured it out. Then from there a couple of clicks on the label maker and we made our own 5 star!! Great product and better now with labels!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Young

customer_reviews.title: This little gadget surprised me!
customer_reviews.text: I just was sitting, staring at a pile of zucchini from the garden. I wanted to dehydrate them, and wasn't looking forward to chopping them up. I remembered that I'd purchased this spiralizer a while back. It's been sitting in the back of my cupboards gathering dust. I hauled it out, rinsed it off, popped a zucchini into it with a 5mm blade, spun the handle a few times, and I had perfect spirals for they dehydrator. Unlike my mixer, which also has a spiralizer, it is light weight, and using the suction cup on the right surface, it doesn't budge. I can see myself using this gadget quite a bit this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirl2mk

customer_reviews.title: Works just like advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I just made my first zoodles using the 2mm blade. I cannot believe how easy that was and they look just like the advertisement photos. Not sure I'll need it for anything else but worth every penny for me just to make noodles this well. I previously had a small manual one and there is a world of difference between them. These are restaurant quality now. The suction also works very well.
customer_reviews.author: FSS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I really love using this to make carb-free noodles. It works well. I am curious to see how long the blades hold up for, but since they are all replaceable I can just get more. The suction cup feature on the bottom is very useful. A better noodle catcher to fit onto the back would be helpful but one can easily make do with any shallow bowl or pan. Overall, it's a very great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fartypants

customer_reviews.title: Best of all I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth spiralizer I've either tried, or used for a while (and subsequently broke!). It's also the first one that has a suction pad which actually keeps it in place. No more awkward hand-positions to hold it down & spiralize at the same time! Quality is excellent. Blades are VERY sharp. Price is great too. If you're new to spiralizers, just get this one first. You're starting with the best. (Only reason it's not a 5-star is because it tends to stain easily. I use mine for sweet potatoes, and have to scrub it every time to get the orange color off the plastic.)
customer_reviews.author: Chris Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, only four stars because the body of the machine is so light you have to hold it down while you crank the handle, otherwise it will flip over or rock back and forth. Looks a lot heavier than it actually is. But the blades are sharp and they give you a great variety!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney D.

customer_reviews.title: A great little spiralizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the second spiralizer I have purchased. The first one I use myself, and the second one was a gift. I like the versatility of blade sizes and styles. The fact that the blades can be stored inside the unit is great. Using a spiralizer is a great way to add healthy fresh vegetables to my cooking While it is not super compact, it does fold down for storage. Since the unit is plastic cleanup is fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use spiralizer
customer_reviews.text: After using several other spiralizers, I was really quite skeptical as whether or not this one was going to be any good. Thankfully after my first use I can say that this machine is very easy to use and very easy to clean. Assembly is very intuitive, which is really nice when you’re in a rush and you need to get food prepped. There’s no searching for instruction manuals. My favorite Thing about the spiralize or is it accommodates a wide variety of vegetables sizes. I have pulled zucchini out of my garden that have been monstrous, and this machine was able to spiralize with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: A Captured Imagination

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget.  Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help me eat fewer carbs and add more vegetables with my diet. So far I’ve only used zucchini with it, but I have to say that it’s really easy to use. I have coordination issues, so you can bet that when something is easy for me, then it’s super easy. I cannot get the suction to work, but that’s no big deal. It still works great and is easy to clean. I wish there were room to store all the blades, but it’s fine. I still love this. You can get a lot of “noodles” from a single zucchini.
customer_reviews.author: Cordellia R.

customer_reviews.title: Grate little item. (See what I did there?)
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good tool if you're looking for alternatives to regular old pasta. We've only used it for zucchini so far, and it does an awesome job. One tip I have is to stop cranking after a few turns and cut the spirals or you'll be trying to eat 3 ft long noodles. The suction works great and holds the tool firmly to the counter. It's easy to clean and all the extra attachments give you plenty of size and shape options. This is much better than the "pencil sharpener' type spiralizers. Hardly any leftover waste of our veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Mudd

customer_reviews.title: Lots of possibilities with this tool!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of fun with this spiralizer. Hand-powered, easy to use. Cleanup takes just a couple of minutes if you do it before the food dries on. I don't have the recommended countertop, but the suction works pretty well on my varnished wood sideboard, or a cookie sheet. The instructions are clear and informative. The only food so far that has been less successful is apple slices. The central core of seeds can be bigger than the "corer" on the spiralizer, leaving bits of seeds and seed coverings in the prepared apples.
customer_reviews.author: SandH

customer_reviews.title: This was really easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 4 star because I have only used it once. This was really easy to set up and use. I did a spiral cut with the 5mm blade using zucchini and yellow squash and sautéed them in olive and onion and it turned out great. My husband really enjoyed the dish and I will be doing other vegetables as well. Can't wait to try it again. The clean up was easy and I like the storage for the blades. Thanks for an awesome product. Will probably update my review after I have used it a few more times.
customer_reviews.author: Cjpurlecraze

customer_reviews.title: A versatile spiralizer that does NOT disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Terrific spiralizer! Very easy to use and clean. Suction bottom allows you to capitalize with confidence and ease. My first spiralizer was from a well known brand where the host has a party. It had limited blades and the design made cleaning a nightmare. I stopped using it after a month. Not the case with he Breighton. It is well designed and has 5blades that can be safely stored so you won't accidentally cut yourself. Great product and was shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana G

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use is important.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use is important. I like this product so much, I bought an additional one for my daughter to make Zoodles with her preschooler! Note, adult supervision is required when using as the parts are sharp. We got a picky 3 yr old to eat HIS zucchini noodles after he made them using the Briefton Spiralizer. Highly recommend this item. So many recipes on the internet for zoodles. Give it a try. Note, we store it in it's original box in the cabinet so the pieces stay together.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelsmom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy easy to use and clean and affordable spiralizer.
customer_reviews.text: This affordable and sturdy spiralizer is easy to use and clean and makes it so easy to make keto friendly meals and fancy ingredients for salads or cooked veggies. The suction is pretty strong so there was no problem pushing the vegetable into the blade and you can set it up next to the sink so that a container in the sink catches the spiralizer veggies. I used daikon (Japanese radish) to make noodles and salad strings and also a bed for sashimi.
customer_reviews.author: mmh

customer_reviews.title: Great spiralizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband for his birthday because he wanted to make “zoodles.” We has look at the Kitchen Aid attachment, but he wasn’t sure he would get enough use out of it for the price. So I saw this one on Amazon. We have made fried potatoes, sweet potato noodles, and zoodles to take the place of pasta. It is a great little kitchen tool at a great price. It is sturdy, very well made and has a good number of different blades. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacsu

customer_reviews.title: Spikes that hold food break off and bend.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this spiralizer. It was easy to use and worked well other than the spikes that hold the food in place started breaking off with first use. After the second use several spikes had broken off and some were bent. I decided to return it because at that rate there would be no spikes to hold the food after a few more uses. Don't know if mine was just defective or if they all have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: dmcbowden

customer_reviews.title: You need to put some force behind it
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind this is not an automatic or powered food processor. It requires some elbow grease. You need to put pressure on your vegetable as you're rotating it with the handle to feed it into the blade. This makes the suction feature super important. If this ever fails, the unit will be useless. So far it works great. With vegetables like zucchini, you have stop now and then to pull the seeds out of the way, but it makes great zoodles. Much lighter weight than i anticipated. the "storage" drawer for the blades would have been more useful if it was larger to accommodate all the blades but at this price point, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zucchini noodles made very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have been making zucchini noodles a lot lately and I was getting frustrated of how long and labor some it would take. I thought there has got to be a better way. I did a search on Amazon and found this product. It spiralized my zucchini very quickly and with little effort. I like that it comes with different size blades and can be used for bigger vegetables where my other gadget only worked with slim size vegetables. I like that it came with a link where you could download several ebooks with recipes. I look forward to trying the recipes and spiralizing other veggies
customer_reviews.author: R. Deamicis

customer_reviews.title: Not that easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a good variety of cutting blades that are easy to change, but it does have its drawbacks. the unit doesn't stick to rough surfaces and winds up sliding around with no place you can comfortably hold it to steady it. Also as you cut the product it goes onto the turning handle slider and then falls off as you pull the handle back, making it hard to use a bowl to catch the vegetables. Your forced to use a plate.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny G

customer_reviews.title: Great spiralizer.
customer_reviews.text: The suction works so well I had difficulty releasing it. Super easy to clean with warm sudsy water and a soft brush (I used a tooth brush). It spiralized carrots with no trouble, and I did an entire large head of cabbage in a few short minutes. In addition I've spiralized zucchini, onion, turnips, and cucumber. All worked well. The only criticism I have is that the stand-alone slicing blade is too thin. It would be nice if it were at least 5mm. Perhaps a thicker slice blade is available? This is a small consideration since for thicker slices I can use my mandolin.
customer_reviews.author: Freezer Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I did some price comparisons, read reviews, and came to the conclusion this would be a good bet. Glad I did! I can make my vegan meals that my husband also enjoys. This is very easy to use and clean. I thought I would have a hard time learning, but it comes with a great instruction manual and guide to show you options of veggies and fruits you can use and which blade to use. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Holley

customer_reviews.title: A Kitchen Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I use my Spiralizer weekly with potatoes and carrots. This product makes the potatoes and carrots looks so nice on the plate; they also cook better. The suction cup under this product is strong enough to keep it in place until I'm ready to loose it for easy cleaning. The storage place on the base is very handy when you are using more than one blade for a dish. I highly recommend that everyone should have this spiralizer in their kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: ILoveMovies

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed in the least!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money - exactly as advertised. I wish it was a bit more weighted down / heavier all around, but with the suction it provides to the countertop, it doesn't make a big difference. Very easy to use and quick to put up / break down for cleaning. Great addition for dieting and cutting carbs to replace the noodles / pasta w/ something more vegetable friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The parts of the machine that hold the vegetable, don't! Tried two different ones; could not make it work at all. My husband being more mechanical, says it will not ever work. Wish I had returned it before deadline. Sorry; I really wanted this.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good one - UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: I have used multiple spiralizers before. I am not a fan of this one, you have to push it while you spiralize it, it is not on good tracks and feels very cheaply made. I will likely return this. It more mushes your vegetables than actually cuts. In return for fixing my review, the company is allowing me to keep this item with a full refund. I would say it is worth trying it as their customer service seems very quick to act and correct the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make zoodles (zucchini noodles). It was very easy to use, and was mostly assembled when it arrived (I just had to switch out the blade). I used the 2mm blade to make my zoodles in the picture, and they came out perfect on my first try! I just sautéed them in olive oil with some Italian herbs for 2-3 minutes, and topped them with some grated cheese. Wonderful product for anyone who grows their own zucchini!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Young

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I wish that I used it more, but that is just because I forget about it sometimes. It works great, it is super easy to clean, and I have not had any issues with it so far. All the recipes I've tried with it have been a huge hit! Great way to substitute some vegetables for carbs. I researched several other options, and this seemed to be the best value for the price. I wasn't looking for a huge investment, but I also wanted something easy to use and something reliable. Also I like easy to clean appliances and this fit the bill. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Meljo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with this spiralizer
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this useful kitchen tool. It is easy to use and easy to clean. The suction feature that keeps the device locked in place while you use it, is wonderful. It remains secure and doesn't feel like it is unstable or unbalanced. We have used it so far for carrots, zucchini,onions, and jicama. Being able to spiralize veggies gives you texture alternatives from the usual chopped salad components. I am completely satisfied with this product so far. I would recommend this product to my friends and family without feeling like I embellished the capabilities of this handy kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.author: Alchemy5150

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She hasn't used it yet but I LOVE mine. We eat a LOT of zoodles. They are a tasty, healthy, alternative to pasta. We don't miss the pasta one bit! I've learn a few tricks to zoodles along the way. I like to saute mine just a bit (to keep some crunch) and then put them in a clean dish towel and squeeze squeeze squeeze! Otherwise, they tend to water down yours sauce. They are actually just as good raw. I'll be testing that theory again tonight with zoodles and meatballs.
customer_reviews.author: angie kunze

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to order the attachment for my appliance so decided to try this as I would only use it once in awhile. It works well, but it is something that I would not use often so did not want to spend as much money for one. It was not difficult to use and clean up was easy. It came with multiple sized slicers.
customer_reviews.author: TX Lady Triker

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: This upgraded version of the 5 blade spiralizer is great. I especially like the suction on the bottom which holds the unit secure while in use. The addition of the storage box for the blades that do not fit into the unit is also a nice feature. I will be recommending this to my vegetarian friends!
customer_reviews.author: ShazzaT

customer_reviews.title: WoW!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I didnt think this would be a good appliance. I saw pleanty of electric ones that looked cool and had all the bells and whistles. Then I ran into this one. Had a good price so I said why not. Well I'm super happy I ordered this one instead of the electric ones out there. This is so easy to use and it does the job perfectly! My wife loves it! Above all it's easy to clean and store. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a good quality appliance to add to your kitchen collection.
customer_reviews.author: ThatMutha

customer_reviews.title: Easier for this arthritis sufferer to use than others I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I checked that it was easy to clean, but there are caveats: I spiralized only raw vegetables (no grease), cleaned the machine's removable parts as soon as I finished so that vegetable material didn't dry and harden, and used a soft vegetable brush & running hot water to do it. My husband complained that it was HARD to clean, but that was after the parts sat in the sink for a while after dinner & he tried to use a dishcloth (which caught on the sharp parts).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong best Spiralizer ever....
customer_reviews.text: Wow... I read many of the reviews before making my purchase. They were all correct, best Spiralizer ever. I use it daily. Sits on my counter for easy access. I love all the blades and safe storage for them all. The great part is how secure it suction cups to my Corian counter. I have cooked with zucchini, yellow squash, carrots and cucumber and hope to find more to spiralize. It is so guick and easy. Cleans up easily. I recommend this Spiralizer to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: KD from Fl.

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a spiralizer for years and am so happy with this purchase. I used it right away to make zucchini pasta and it was so simple. The core of the zucchini is left and I just chopped those up to eat in my salad the next day. The suction cups are very strong and hold nicely on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I just received my 5 Blade Spiraizer yesterday. A very fast delivery. I had to unpack it immediately and see what it was like and read the instructions. I found them very clear and easy to understand. Today, I did as suggested and watched a video on it. It does help to watch the video. After watching the video I just had t take the time to try it out. I only tried it out on zucchini. It works great I love it. It definitely makes a nice food presentation. I recommend this to all who are looking for a different way for preparing food or for watching their diet as they suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little kitchen gadget. The blades are sharp and you need to be very careful when handling them. I found out the hard way, but it is only common sense. I spiralize many things now, just a lot of fun and the grandkids love stuff they might not normally eat because it looks like noodles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Spiralizer
customer_reviews.text: This spiralizer has incorporated several improvements that make this the only one to buy. The improvements include a smaller size that doesn't limit it's capability and a storage caddy to help keep the spare blades corralled. The best improvement is the positive locking/unlocking suction pad that holds the unit securely in place, making it much easier to use and much less likely to make a mess. If you're in the market for a spiralizer I would recommend this one without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Something new...
customer_reviews.text: I am famiar with the older, less elaborate spiralizers of the past, but I was intrigued with a countertop machine that would do the same. It is easy to use and, as important, easy to clean. Bretton has kept me informed with tricks and recipes that take adva stage of their machine. Most impressive was their willingness to share what CANNOT be done with a spiralizer. Eggplant is a problem and I won't waste time finding that out on my own. I am an advocate for kitchen simple ideas-chop your own vegetables, slice you own meat, etc., but the Brefton's Spiralizer does things I si.ply CANNOT do easily or quickly on my own.
customer_reviews.author: JFSIV

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well at all, veggies keep falling off
customer_reviews.author: Diane Duong

customer_reviews.title: Can’t give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I can’t give this 5 stars because the suction cup was broken out of the box and didn’t realize it until after we used it. So that part doesn’t work properly. It appears to be a manufacturer defect. With two people it can be operated by holding it in place and another person spinning it. Maybe the seller will reach out with a fix?
customer_reviews.author: B_savy

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance
customer_reviews.text: I use this just about every day - so far my favorite is making sweet potato noodles for chicken noodle soup. It's light weight and easy to handle, yet sturdy enough to spiralize everything I've put into it. The only issue for me has been translating the blade sizes shown on this machine to the letter names used in the cookbook I bought. But that's done, and I'm very happy with my purchase. I'd recommend this to anyone who wants a fun and interesting way to include more vegetables in their diet.
customer_reviews.author: GulfGal

customer_reviews.title: I love this gadget
customer_reviews.text: Have been doing zoodles for a few months. But this gadget is amazing. Have had it for only a couple of days but have used it twice already with zucchini. It turns a zucchini into spaghetti-like noodles in less than 30 seconds. Cut the ends - put into the gadget - start turning and creating great zoodles. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dan

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This spiralizer is great for the money. Super suction to the counter so it's stays in place when using. However, it does not have anything to catch the food and even if you put a plate there, still makes a small mess and may not stay on the plate. Blades are easy to remove, but not super easy to clean well without a brush.
customer_reviews.author: A.Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I had some spiral zucchini noddles at a restaurant and simply fell in love with them. I purchased this and the ease of using it to achieve various styles, thickness, etc is simply marvelous. Now I am spiralling everything..lol... because it is so easy and the taste of vegetables paired with the beautiful designs makes them more appealing to eat. Oh..I have to share this one...spiral an onion..it is so beautiful. I am also purchasing another for my daughter and sharing all the easy recipes I have come up with.
customer_reviews.author: Emb

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I looked at tons of spiralizers before deciding on this one and I’m really happy with my purchase. The large suction cup is super sturdy, and I didn’t feel like it was difficult to lock it down at all. The handle turns smooth and effortlessly, and makes perfect zoodles. I thought it might be hard to turn the handle on a sweet potato but it was just as easy. When mine arrived one of the prongs that holds the veggie in place was chipped, so I emailed Brieftons customer service and they responded in 30 minutes of my email and sent me a new part right away.
customer_reviews.author: FBC Sumter

customer_reviews.title: Yummy veggie noodles!
customer_reviews.text: The Briefton's spiralizer is awesome! It is well-engineered so that it goes together easily, is strong enough for large vegetables,stores compactly, and is a breeze to clean. Interchangeable blades make it versatile., and the suction works great on my Formica-type table, though I did re-grip it between larger, hard vegetables. The hand crank works very well, and my tired wrist was not the fault of the machine, but because I was having so much fun, I didn't want to stop! We're having butternut squash and zucchini "zoodles" for dinner tonight!
customer_reviews.author: LCat

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: i can make spiral potatoes . i coat them with a little peanut oil lay them in a baking pan. i use way less oil this way
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Scott Silva

customer_reviews.title: makes great 'zoodles'
customer_reviews.text: This veetable slicer has SO MANY options...I purchased it to make 'zoodles' and they are PERFECT! The only 'negative'...is that it is not easy to clean..the pieces that come off that can go thru the dishwasher are EASY TO CLEAN...but juices drip in the base...and that needs to be cleaned as well. ALL AND ALL...good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use. Easy to Clean. Eating Veggies and Fruit Has Never Been More Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Briefton's 5-Blad Spiralizer this week and I'm SO glad I ordered it! I found out about it through a personal chef who doesn't go anywhere without it (he took his spiralizer to Korea to chef for an Olympic team). Now I see why! It's easy to use, easy to clean, and even though I already love veggies, I love them more now with all the different shapes I can serve up. I highly recommend this spiralizer! It will revolutionize your meal plans!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hill

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a more powerful spiralizer than my hand-held version and after reading the product description an reviews bought the the Briefton 5-blade spiraled. So far I have been very pleased with the results. I have tried zucchini, carrots and cucumber using different blades and they all turned out very well. The suction cup on the bottom of the unit works very well and really grips the countertop (which is necessity). Both the unit and the blades are quite easy to wash, which is another plus. I would definitely recommend this unit for someone who wants a simple to use and effective spiralizer.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A. Becker

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It's sturdy and I love that it comes with five different blade options. My only concern will be water getting inside the product when I clean it and growing mold inside
customer_reviews.author: Francheska

customer_reviews.title: Perf
customer_reviews.text: Dont really care about suction ability or easy to clean. Dishes suck to clean anyway. Tried it on granite tops and wood surfaces. Suction sucks.... not in a good way no matter how ya look at it. But it works for what MATTERS. Spiralizing. Fantastically so. I let a few of my friends borrow it and they haven't even messed it up. SHARP! Be omw mindful when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kira S Robles

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN HANDHELD SPIRALIZER
customer_reviews.text: It actually works. I'm amazed. I previously bought the cheap hand spiralizer which was ridiculously annoying to use. Especially when you have a large family and not enough time. This saves me so much time and its just fun to use in general. It's not perfect, but it is probably the best spiralizer for under 50 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I previously bought a cuisinart spiraler that was horrible. After I returned that one I purchased this ...
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought a cuisinart spiraler that was horrible. After I returned that one I purchased this one. I've only used it once, but it really worked great. The suction cup kept it in place while I cranked. I had a little slipage on the back side of a cucumber when the teeth "stripped out" of the cucumber, but I repositioned it and went on. I wish there were better directions and recipes besides the online downloadable recipes.
customer_reviews.author: AG Albuquerque

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed and covers every type of cut for veggies
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this Spiralizer; it's going to be wonderfully complete except I haven't learned how to use it yet...I'm working on it and looking forward to be able to use it very soon. Hey, I just found the visual videos in an earlier email that Brieftons sent to me and had I read it... and watched the "how-to" instructions I would be a PRO. It is very simple to use and operate any way you spirilize it.
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: It works but if you have the money to get something better.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stick to the counter very well. I used it to spiralize a few zucchini is that I grew but it wasn't that great and very messy. It needed frequent clearing out. Another case of you get what you pay for. If you have the money, invest in something higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hurley

customer_reviews.title: This is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I am on my 3rd round of the whole 30 diet. This is a lifesaver on it!! Love my zuchinni noodles ! Beyond easy to make and my kids get a kick out of watching me make the noodles too! So it's also entertainment ;). This is very easy to clean up as well and it secures itself very well to the counter ! I highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Love the different settings
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than the last one I had that broke after about six months. I like the different inserts that allow various shapes, but primarily use just one for zucchini, which is the most common vegetable I place in the spiralizer. I wish it had an attachable compartment that would catch the spiralized pieces, but it's not a deal-breaker. The other issue is that it doesn't feel like it will last for years. It's plastic, and I can see replacing it in about a year when something breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I was surprised. The design and the materials make it easy to set up, make perfect veggie pasta and so so easy to clean. The whole process can take five minutes or absolutely less than 10 minutes depending on how much you are making. Beet juice and carrot juice just slide off with rinsing under the faucet. I can spend precious time thinking up new sauces. I like to saute the pasta in a little x-olive oil or coconut oil and then add minced herbs, garlic and so on - cover and let it wilt a little till the pasta is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Easier than ever to eat Healthy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the ease of use and the quick preparation of healthier meals. I have purchased vegetable slicers and gadgets made to aid in food preparation in the past and because vegetables are sometimes very dense, I physically could not push the veggies through the slicers. Not so with this device. The suction cups on the bottom hold the spiralizer securely on the countertop and the design of the handles allow for quick, virtually effortless preparation of numerous fresh foods. Never been happier with a device!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great kichen tool!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I no longer have to buy the expensive frozen spiralized veggies...I can make my own. They look just like the frozen kind but taste so much better fresh. I'll be planting a garden this year and can't wait to use this gadget more..The blades are super sharp...handle carefully and the suction power could be better, but over all its a great tool in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: maybe for other but not for what need had to buy other that really made the spaghetti how I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I really expected more from this machine, it is not as easy to clean as they say and in addition to that the spaghetti is not long. well cut and look like short noodles. I don't like it because the vegetables are cut and I don't even get the length of the vegetable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It is Okay but not Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I watched all the videos and never have achieved the long pieces they show. It is okay and like it better than the little hand held one I have . I use it only for zucchini . I wish I could have tried it first .... then I would NOT have purchased it. I am not usually inept with kitchen gadgets so for this not to work with ease as the video showed was surprising to me. I would not whole hearty recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jairus Valla

customer_reviews.title: Best Spiralizer
customer_reviews.text: I reallly enjoy using this Spiralizer, I constantly use this Spiralizer to make veggie noodles from all types of vegetables, the process is very seemless. I have owned this Spiralizer for over two years now and the blades are still pretty sharp after constant usage. The Spiralizer is also very easy to clean. Overall this is great Spiralizer, another top of the class Brieftons product.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen appliance!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of kitchen appliances! Bought this to help with my no carb/low carb meals. I love the different blades which are very easy to change out and clean. The spiralizer was already assembled in its box and was well packaged for shipping. Have had no problems with using the suction cup on my counter top, it holds the spiralizer in place. Best thing since sliced bread! Do not hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Switched from a hand-held spiraling device to this one, hoping it would be easier and faster! I turned out to be a great move- this thing is fast and easy! I was able to easily set it up and spiralize 4 zucchini within about 5 minutes! Perfect! The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars- there is only room to store up to 3 blades (including the one being used) within the device, the other 3 have to be stored separately and that annoys me a little. Overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design and execution
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality on display and the thoughtful design of the functionality. It's easy to set up and use, and very easy to break down and clean. My daughter has been a vegetarian for about six months, and we all enjoy fresh vegetables, so I expect to get a lot of use from this. I would gladly buy it again as a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Saving money, eating better, having fun!
customer_reviews.text: We'd been buying "spirlized" zucchini from the grocery, at $5.99/lb. Sometime, it was apparent that they were non to fresh. Now, buy whole zucchini and yellow squash for less that $1/lb, and process it ourselves. Fresher, tastier, cheaper! And if you rince it off immediately after use, it's really easy to clean. This is a fun tool to use. Works as advertised. Wish the instructions were a bit more complete (for example, what are all the different blades used for? ). But once we figured it all out, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: If I can use this device easily, anyone can. I have two left thumbs when it comes to the kitchen. We have owned other spiralizers in the past, but the Brieftons is, by far, the easy to use, and the most well built. It feels solid and will last a long time. Add to that the low price and you have a winner product. On occasion I will spend money and be glad I did. This was one of those times.
customer_reviews.author: Tormentor

customer_reviews.title: I downloaded the recipe ebook which was very easy to do
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I just received my spiralizer today and haven't actually had a chance to use it yet. I have watched the video and cannot wait to go out and buy out the produce department so I can try it out and start eating healthy. I downloaded the recipe ebook which was very easy to do. Just read the pamphlet that comes with the product. Delivery was very fast. I'll be back to tell you more about my experience with it. I think I am going to love this and save money instead of buying the spiralized veggies at the market at a high price, I will be able to make my own fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Bev S

customer_reviews.title: i would die for this spiralizer
customer_reviews.text: I love my spiralizer so much, it's like my firstborn child. If I didn't have it, I would wage war for a thousand years until its return. I almost exclusively use it to make zucchini noodles and they are excellent. I tried it with an apple once and that was good too. Overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: Castillian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price. Suction to counter works great.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and still learning with it. One of the reasons I bought this brand was because it has suction cup to stabilize on counter. I have arthritis in my hands and holding it down concerned me. This works well for me. The quality of the item is good. I made zucchini noodles and they turned out good. I had a couple of boo boos but were entirely operator error. I would highly recommend this spiralizer.
customer_reviews.author: DJT

customer_reviews.title: Have already put to good use.
customer_reviews.text: I loved there was a video to explain how each blade works, and which vegetable will be best with each blade. I had a little trouble with my cabbage, didn't realize it was to large. Once I quartered it. it shredded very quickly and uniformly. I made coleslaw and it made shredding a breeze. From my garden this year I plan to spiralize many vegetables. Thank you for such a well produced product, with all the different blades. and priced so reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This spiralizer is great. Extremely easy to use. I do like the storage feature it has within the product where it stored a couple of the blades on the side near the bottom and comes with a holder for the rest of the blades. Definitely helps with eating healthier. Just be careful when washing the blades off. It is extremely sharp and the food can sometimes get caught between the blades. I recommend using a scrub brush with tough bristles to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Huge time saver
customer_reviews.text: I try to eat a mostly raw diet. Zucchini noodles came out great. I am a coleslaw addict and I make a huge batch about every 10 days. I put cabbage, red onion and carrots that I spiralize in my slaw. Huge time saver for me over having to chop up everything. This product is very well made. When I'm done I put all the pieces in my dishwasher. Really glad I chose Brieftons out of the many companies out there to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: J. Silver

customer_reviews.title: Great value--and yes, the blades are marked with sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed. I just received the spiralizer yesterday. The blades are indeed marked with size on the edges of the case they're in, so there's no confusion. I have all kinds of plans for this kitchen tool, and I think it's great value for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: M. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's really easy to use, although the noodles are super long, so I have to cut them. I know it's a user error, so I'm working it out. Unfortunately, the magnet only worked the first time I used it. It doesn't work at all anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa W

customer_reviews.title: I ABSOLUTELY love my new Spiralizer
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY love my new Spiralizer!! It is a diabetic dream. One of the hardest things to give up as a diabetic was pasta. Now I have my fix!! I am able to create all of my pasta dishes but healthier! Super easy to use and super easy to clean. I have actually inspired my friends to buy one. Being diabetic is hard so when I am able to find something that helps me stay healthy, I get really excited! This is a yes, yes and a yes from me!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Monroy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My biggest concern was whether the spiralizer would slide around the countertop while I was cranking. That turned out to be an unnecessary concern; the device is quite stable once affixed by the suction cup. Spiralizing vegetables is fast and easy. Unsurprisingly, cleaning out the area between spikes that hold the vegetable in place is a little difficult, but it doesn't get that dirty anyway. Overall, well worth the money if you plan to create spiralized pasta-replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Frans Bouman

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a spriralizer and this looked to be a good one. It is. It is well made, is easy to use, and produces very good results. She's fully satisfied with it. One caution: the blades are razor sharp (as they should be), so be extra careful when washing (I learned the hard way).
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S

customer_reviews.title: So excited to try!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to try the new Spiralizer. When you order this product the support is incredible. I received links to several videos on how to use the Sprializer, Clean the spiralizer, etc. You also can download a free cookbook which is great because the recipes look so good. I can't wait to make the Pod Thai. There are so many tasty recipes! I read many reviews prior to buying this Spiralizer. Based on those reviews and the excellent customer support I know that I have made a smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to read.

customer_reviews.title: Could work better
customer_reviews.text: While we get the spiralized veggies we want out of this, it is not easy to clean, the suction cup comes undone several times during use and you’re using a lot more muscled to get the veggie pushed in to go through the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Airbornliz

customer_reviews.title: Terrifically easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Studied the different models before I choose this one. It is easy to use especially for a person who is unable to handle any other type. All you do is insert the blade you want, add the zucchini and crank away. Actually fun to use. Love making zucchini noodles.
customer_reviews.author: Library Lady I

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We have a spiralizer arrachment for our kitchen aid mixer which has worked fine except the part that attaches to the mixer which turns the vegetables is made of plastic and after only five or ten uses the spikes are starting to wear. The turning base of this unit is metal so I expect it to last a long time. Great variety of blades and the suction cup on the bottom holds it to our granite counter like it was bolted on. Looking forward to looking at their recipes online
customer_reviews.author: Paul G

customer_reviews.title: Love This Little Gadget
customer_reviews.text: There were some good and bad reviews on this little device but I took a chance on it. I am glad that I did. I only used it once, but the first time was a charm. Spiraled my zucchini with ease and quickness and I like the options with the blades. Extremely easy to clean and not too big so it does not take up a lot of space storage wise. I would purchase again ten times over.
customer_reviews.author: ASBSMS

customer_reviews.title: Works but only for someone with muscles
customer_reviews.text: I liked this spiralizer at first only using it for zucchini. However, if I use a carrot - it takes forever to spiralize - I am not that strong to keep pushing on it. If you don't have issue with strength then this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Orianna

customer_reviews.title: It is a convenient tool to make veggie noodles!
customer_reviews.text: The good thing is it can produce veggie noodles, while the drawback is that it is not easy to use. Suction power is not strong enough. One has to use something like chopping board to support the spiralizer when one pushes the handle to spiralize food. Cleaning is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Zhong

customer_reviews.title: Suction fails after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I have to say my suction cup failed after only a few uses and now the whole spiralizer is useless. The suction cup can’t be replaced as far as I can find. I feel ripped off and strongly recommend against this spiralizer.
customer_reviews.author: Cheez Whiz Smile

product_meta.title: Brieftons 5-Blade Spiralizer (BR-5B-02): Strongest-and-Heaviest Duty Vegetable Spiral Slicer, Best Veggie Pasta Spaghetti Maker for Low Carb/Paleo/Gluten-Free, With Extra Blade Caddy & 4 Recipe Ebooks
feature_bullets: BEST RATED, LATEST 2019 DESIGN with SUPERIOR VALUE: Don't waste your hard earned money on other old & weak designs. Our All New Improved Brieftons Spiralizer is GUARANTEED to be markedly stronger than any of the others on the market. You get a complete spiralizing bundle with 5 interchangeable blades, extra blade caddy for safe blade storage, printed color user manual, easy online quick-start guide with our demo videos, and 4 exclusive Brieftons Ebooks with delicious recipes you can make today!

STRONGEST YET & QUALITY ABOVE ALL: No expense was spared in making this the best quality spiralizer | 5 LABELED BLADES: Made of Japanese 420-grade hardened stainless steel to ensure they will always stay ultra sharp | SUPERSIZED FOOLPROOF SUCTION PAD: Stays firmly locked to countertops for HOURS. Don't settle for models with small weak suction cups! HANDLES & BODY: Made of 100% BPA-free, reinforced ABS, strong enough to withstand the hardest veggies e.g. butternut squash, sweet potatoes, beets.

GET THE MOST FOR YOUR MONEY: ✅ 5 clearly labeled blades to make a wide variety of cuts (2/3/5/5.5mm & ribbons) ✅ Supersized, foolproof suction pad with easy ON/OFF lever for steadfast operation ✅ Extra blade caddy for safe blade storage - no more loose blades ✅ Quick release mechanism of blade rack for the most compact storage ✅ Designed to be dead easy to use, clean & store, even for arthritis hands ⚠ If you had other spiralizers with failed suction cups or broken handles, you need to see this!

OPEN UP A WHOLE NEW WORLD OF HEALTHY EATING: Use recipe ideas from your accompanied Ebooks to start making healthy & tasty gourmet meals your whole family will love! It's the quickest way for you to replace carb/calorie loaded meals with numerous healthy veggie dishes, saving you valuable time, money & improving your health all the while, even if you are on a diet (raw, vegan, low carb, gluten-free, no wheat, Paleo) | A PERFECT GIFT FOR ALL OCCASIONS: What can be better than this gift of health?

LIFETIME REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE, BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: You are covered by our lifetime no-hassle replacement policy. We are the trusted spiralizer brand with thousands of happy customers, and we want you to have absolute peace of mind when you order today! JOIN our RAVING FAN club: Our product has been seen on Cooks Illustrated, Food & Wine, the Food Network, The Telegraph, national magazines and newspapers, as well as put to the test and thoroughly loved by countless satisfied Amazon customers.
